pages.text: Protecting the weak against projectiles and strong enemies, the tanks are a must have in a great battle. Their strong armor blocks almost every attack. Without good preparation to take him down, a tank will be almost invincible.

pages.title: Passive Abilities
pages.text: $(li) -35% Damage taken: Any damage from the these $(l:other/damage_taken)damage sources$() gets the following calculation 0.65 x DamageIncome = NewDamageIncome. $(li) -10% Projectile damage taken: Any damage from projectiles gets the following calculation 0.9 x ProjectileDamageTaken = NewProjectileDamageTaken.
$(li) -10% Movement speed: Any movement, walking, running or sneaking gets a 0.9 x MovementSpeed = NewMovementSpeed. This also works against other speed change attributes such as speed effects.
